# The Mutapa Times
> Zimbabwe's business and intelligence newspaper

## About
The Mutapa Times is a business and intelligence newspaper delivering curated Zimbabwean news from foreign press for the diaspora and native residents. Founded in 2020, it aggregates coverage from over 100 international and local sources including BBC, Reuters, The Guardian, Al Jazeera, ZimLive, NewsDay, Bulawayo24, and more.

## Sections
- News: Aggregated Zimbabwe headlines from international and local press, updated hourly
- Live Economy Data: Real-time Zimbabwe economic indicators, exchange rates, and market data
- Articles: Original analysis, opinion, and reporting from The Mutapa Times editorial team
- People: Profiles of notable Zimbabwean business leaders, entrepreneurs, and executives

## Key Topics
Zimbabwe, Zimbabwean diaspora, Harare, Bulawayo, Gweru, Mutare, Victoria Falls, business, politics, economy, health, technology, culture, sport, environment, education, policy, crime

## Content Sources
- International press coverage of Zimbabwe (BBC, Reuters, Al Jazeera, The Guardian, Bloomberg, etc.)
- Local Zimbabwean press (ZimLive, NewsDay, Bulawayo24, The Herald, Chronicle, etc.)
- Original editorial content and analysis
- Wikidata for people profiles (Zimbabwean business leaders, entrepreneurs, executives)
- Open-Meteo for weather data
- TradingView for financial market data

## Contact
- Website: https://www.mutapatimes.com
- Email: news@mutapatimes.com
- Twitter/X: @mutapatimes
